meanings.definition: The smallest discrete element of an image or picture on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The computer screen is made up of tiny pixels.
meanings.sent2: The camera captures every detail down to the pixel.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count each pixel on the screen, but they kept moving!
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, a pixel is like a building block of reality.
meanings.sent5: The pixel on the screen glowed brightly, drawing my attention.

meanings.definition: A single point in a graphic image.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully placed each pixel to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The pixel on the logo was perfectly centered.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally enlarged the pixel, and it looked like a giant dot!
meanings.sent4: The pixel in the image was so sharp, it seemed to pierce through the screen.
meanings.sent5: The pixel in the graphic stood out like a tiny gem among the colors.
